title: Do you know an up-to-date redesign of Excelsior?
content:
I know the extremely well designed custom-made font SZ-Text for “Süddeutsche Zeitung” by ErlerSkibbeTönsmann ( [http://bit.ly/MUzN14](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819234218/http:/bit.ly/MUzN14 "http://bit.ly/MUzN14")). Do you know another up-to-date revised version of Excelsior ( [http://bit.ly/YxgWtv](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819234218/http:/bit.ly/YxgWtv "http://bit.ly/YxgWtv"))? Or something similar for use in editorial design?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819234218im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pic1_4169.jpg)

Source: [http://bit.ly/ZGE0XK](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819234218/http:/bit.ly/ZGE0XK "http://bit.ly/ZGE0XK")
author: Quadrato

comments.content: By the way: the picture shows SZ-Text.
